message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been highly valued by our previous customers. I believe it would be a great addition to your collection. Would you like to purchase it for $95?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $75. Would you be willing to consider that?
Thank you for your interest, Bob. I appreciate your feedback. In light of your offer, I would like to counter with a price of $85 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
I'm still a bit above my budget, so I'd like to make a counteroffer of $78. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
I understand your position, Bob. Considering your latest offer, I would like to propose a price of $82 for the product. This is my best offer given its value and what we've discussed.
I'm getting close, but I'd like to try to shave off a few more dollars. Would you be willing to meet me at $79?
I see your point, Bob. I am willing to agree on a price of $81 for the product. This is my final offer, considering the value and your budget.
I'm really close, but I think I can do $80. It's my absolute limit. Would you be willing to meet me there?
